author: Redfoxe

text:
I haven't touched this series yet. As I get older, I'm really starting to see how free time is getting rarer and that's not helping me when it comes to playing video games. I have a huge backlog.

I heard good things about the first VC on PS3 and I thought it was pretty successful, so I'm still not sure why they decided to go with the PSP for #2 and #3. The series has really solid music by Sakimoto, one of my favorite composers.
author: SupraDarky
